nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会

全国人大教育科学文化卫生委员会
全国人大教科文卫委员会
en: Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区前门西大街1号全国人大机关办公楼
location.en: No. 1 Qianmen West Street, Xicheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会设立的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees established by the National People's Congress, the highest state organ of power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任第十四届全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会主任委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chairman of the 14th Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第十四届全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会副主任委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, Vice Chairman of the 14th Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第十四届全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会副主任委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, Vice Chairman of the 14th Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.en: Chinese politician, Vice Chairman of the 14th Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.en: Chinese politician, Vice Chairman of the 14th Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

en: Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本大法。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会组织法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会组织法
en: Organic Law of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 规定全国人民代表大会组织制度和工作程序的基本法律。
description.en: The basic law that stipulates the organizational system and working procedures of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state organ of power of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党全国人民代表大会常务委员会党组

zh-cn: 中国共产党全国人民代表大会常务委员会党组
en: Party Group of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在全国人大常委会设立的领导机构。
description.en: The leading body established by the Communist Party of China in the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会分党组

zh-cn: 中国共产党全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会分党组
en: Sub-Party Group of the Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在全国人大教科文卫委员会设立的领导机构。
description.en: The leading body established by the Communist Party of China in the NPC Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee.

nodes.id: 第六届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第六届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
en: First Session of the 6th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 1983年6月召开的会议，设立了全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会。
description.en: A session held in June 1983 which established the Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第六、七届全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会主任委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Chairman of the 6th and 7th Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第八届全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会主任委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Chairman of the 8th Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第九届全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会主任委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Chairman of the 9th Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第十届全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会主任委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Chairwoman of the 10th Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第十一届全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会主任委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Chairman of the 11th Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第十二届全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会主任委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Chairman of the 12th Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第十三届全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会主任委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Chairman of the 13th Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会
relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 全国人大教科文卫委员会是全国人民代表大会下设的专门委员会，受其领导。
description.en: The NPC Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee is a special committee under the National People's Congress and is led by it.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会
relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 在全国人民代表大会闭会期间，全国人大教科文卫委员会受全国人民代表大会常务委员会领导。
description.en: During the recess of the National People's Congress, the NPC Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee is led by the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中国共产党全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会分党组
relationships.target: 中国共产党全国人民代表大会常务委员会党组

description.zh-cn: 全国人大教科文卫委员会分党组是中国共产党在全国人大常委会党组领导下的机构。
description.en: The Sub-Party Group of the NPC Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee is an organization under the leadership of the Party Group of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

relationships.source: 第六届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会

description.zh-cn: 1983年6月7日，第六届全国人民代表大会第一次会议表决设立了全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会。
description.en: On June 7, 1983, the First Session of the 6th National People's Congress voted to establish the Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会

description.zh-cn: 《中华人民共和国宪法》第七十条规定全国人民代表大会设立专门委员会，为教科文卫委员会的设立提供了法律依据。
description.en: Article 70 of the Constitution of the People's Republic of China stipulates that the National People's Congress shall establish special committees, providing the legal basis for the establishment of the Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会组织法
relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会

description.zh-cn: 《中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会组织法》第三十五条规定了专门委员会的设立，为教科文卫委员会的设立提供了法律依据。
description.en: Article 35 of the Organic Law of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China provides for the establishment of special committees, providing the legal basis for the establishment of the Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee.

description.en: The National People's Congress is the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

description.en: The Standing Committee of the National People's Congress is the permanent body of the National People's Congress.
